FrageText.de: Unter welchen Voraussetzungen dürften Sie dieses Fahrzeug rechts überholen?
FrageText.en: Under what conditions would you be permitted to overtake this vehicle on your right?
FrageText.hr: Pod kojim pretpostavkama biste smijeli ovo vozilo preteći s desne strane?
FrageText.sl: Pod katerimi pogoji smete to vozilo prehiteti po desni?
FrageText.tr: Bu aracı hangi koşullarda sağdan sollayabilirsiniz?

de.Text: Wenn das Fahrzeug nicht im Einsatz ist
Wenn ein Verkehrszeichen am LKW dies anzeigen würde

en.Text: If there was no room on my left
When the vehicle is not in an emergency
When there are no road markings
When a road sign on the truck would indicate this

hr.Text: Ako lijevo ne bi bilo mjesta
Ako bi to pokazivao prometni znak na teretnom automobilu

sl.Text: Če vozilo ni na nujni vožnji
Če prometni znak na tovornem motornrm vozilu to nakazuje

tr.Text: Kamyon üzerinde bir trafik işareti bunu gösterirse
